title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Terror Infrastructures in Southern Lebanon: An In-depth Look”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The IDF has attacked terror infrastructures in several areas in southern Lebanon

Throughout the day, fighter jets attacked several terror infrastructures of the Hezbollah terror organization in the areas of Ayta-ash-Sha’b, Kfar Arnoun, and Tyre Harfa in southern Lebanon.

In addition, IDF forces conducted artillery fire overnight to eliminate threats in the area of Alma al-Shaab and al-Tsawne.

Five launches were detected overnight from Lebanese territory towards the area of Shetula, and several additional launches from Lebanese territory into various areas in the north of the country were detected in recent hours. There were no casualties.
IDF forces attacked the source of the fire.

Attached is footage of IDF attacks in southern Lebanon: https://bit.ly/3J8opzm
